nl_problem: Alan has 8 pine trees in his backyard and each tree drops 200 pine cones. If 30% of the pine cones fall on Alan's roof, and each pine cone weighs 4 ounces, how many ounces of pine cones does Alan have on his roof?
For each positive integer $n$, let $n!$ denote the product $1\\cdot 2\\cdot 3\\cdot\\,\\cdots\\,\\cdot (n-1)\\cdot n$, what is the remainder when 9! is divided by 10?
What is the remainder when $1999^{2000}$ is divided by 5?
Brittany got a 78 on her first test. After her second test, her average rose to an 81. What grade did she get on her second test?
Suppose $f(x)$ is an invertible function, and suppose that $f(2)=f^{-1}(2)=4$.\n\nWhat is the value of $f(f(2))$?
